casebody.head_matter:
Pittsburgh Housing Authority (et al., Appellant), v. Zarpas.
Argued March 14, 1968.
Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagbn, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Louis Vair a, for appellant.
Richard S. Crone, with him Crone and Cohen, for appellees.
April 16, 1968:
